arts.ttl: Partick Thistle 0 Livingston 2: Martindale insists there will be no complacency as he relishes return to plastic for second leg
arts.sum: The Lions took a big step towards the Premiership play-off final last night

arts.ttl: Watch: Goals as Livingston beat Partick Thistle in play-off
arts.sum: Watch the goals as Livingston establish a 2-0 lead over Partick Thistle after the Scottish Premiership play-off semi-final first leg.

arts.ttl: Livingston bag Premiership play-off semi-final first-leg lead at Partick Thistle
arts.sum: The Lions struck against the run of play to break the deadlock through Scott Pittman before Danny Wilson doubled their advantage.

arts.ttl: Preview: Partick Thistle vs. Livingston - prediction, team news, lineups
